attributes.action: Convert the London 2012 Olympic Village Accomodation into Living accomodation for Members of Parliament and end their second home allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Members of Parliament who live outside London need somewhere to stay.  The second home allowance is very controversial.

London 2012 will have an Olympic Village for the competing athletes and will be equipped with modern security facilities.  The infrastructure will be in place to provide safe a secure accommodation.

We can end the MP second home allowance and provide each with a high standard apartment.  As the MP changes the apartment gets a new occupant.  Any MP is free not to take up the apartment and fund their living arrangements from their own resources.

London 2012 is being funding via public money. This will give the site a real legacy and help restore faith in Members of Parliament once again.

government_responses.details:
